content.html: Definitely seeing less humans/people (over brands) on twitter as the humans shift to mastodon or exit entirely. I also keep seeing a chart of "increased engagement" yet the source is a single person that I really wouldn't trust not to fiddle the stats in their favour…
content.value:
Definitely seeing less humans/people (over brands) on twitter as the humans shift to mastodon or exit entirely.

I also keep seeing a chart of "increased engagement" yet the source is a single person that I really wouldn't trust not to fiddle the stats in their favour…
